item.title: At least four dead as fire engulfs Hong Kong tower blocks
item.description: Pictures show the flames spreading on bamboo scaffolding on the outside of the high-rise buildings in the Tai Po district.

item.title: No real intent in Moscow to engage in peace talks, says von der Leyen
item.description: The European Commission chief said the EU would stand with Ukraine and support it "in every way".

item.title: Deadly fire engulfs Hong Kong apartment blocks
item.description: Video footage shows large plumes of smoke billowing up into the sky, as firefighters on cranes try and put out the blaze.

item.title: Bolsonaro ordered to start serving 27-year prison sentence for Brazil coup plot
item.description: The Supreme Court says the former leader has exhausted his appeals and will start his prison term at a police station in Brasilia.

item.title: Trump defends Witkoff after leak appears to show envoy coaching Russia
item.description: The US president said he had not heard the audio, but that it sounded like "standard" negotiations.
